required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety Study of a Contact Lens With Ketotifen in Healthy, Normal Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center, Randomized, Double-Masked, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group Study Evaluating the Safety of a Novel Contact Lens Used Daily in Healthy, Normal Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of a novel contact lens in healthy normal volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: Lid and Lid Margin Erythema, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of lid redness using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Lid and Lid Margin Swelling, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of lid swelling using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe
Assessment of conjunctival redness using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe
Assessment of swelling of the conjunctiva using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe
Assessment of corneal swelling using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe
Assessment of corneal erosion using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe
Assessment of the posterior cornea using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe
Assessment of the clarity of the intraocular lens using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Flare in Anterior Chamber, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of visible protein in the anterior chamber using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Cells in Anterior Chamber, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of visible cells in the anterior chamber using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Corneal Staining - Nasal, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes to the surface of the cornea, the region towards the nose, as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution, using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Corneal Staining - Temporal, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes to the surface of the cornea, the region towards the edge of the face, as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution, using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Corneal Staining - Inferior, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes to the surface of the cornea, the bottom region, as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution, using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Corneal Staining - Superior, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes to the surface of the cornea, the upper region, as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution, using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Corneal Staining - Central, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes to the surface of the cornea, the central region, as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution, using the following scale: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe, 4=very severe

primary_outcome.measure: Dilated Ophthalmoscopy - Fundus, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes in abnormalities on the back part of the eye, using the scale: 0=none, 0.5=trace, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Dilated Ophthalmoscopy - Vitreous, Change From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes in the vitreous (gel-like fulid of the eye), using the scale: 0=none, 0.5=trace, 1=mild, 2=moderate, 3=severe.
Visual acuity was assessed by the investigator using a Snellen visual acuity chart. This outcome counts the number of eyes that had vision of 20/40 or better at the 12 week visit.

arm_group.description: Ketotifen combination drug-device product: contact lens (device) and anti-allergy drug

intervention.description: K-Lens (generic name not established) and Ketotifen combination drug-device product

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy normal, soft contact lens wearing volunteers
- normal ocular health
- contact lens correction from +6.00 to -12.00D in each eye and astigmatism of -1.00D or less in each eye
Exclusion Criteria:
- active ocular infection
- history of ocular surgery
- use of topical ophthalmic preparations (including rewetting drops)
- pregnancy or lactation

event.description: Benign tumor on an ovary, unrelated to test article.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Investigator agrees not to publish or publicly present the results of the study without the prior written approval of the sponsor.
